author: Lloyd Brookes <75pound@gmail.com>
description: Find and either replace or remove items in an array
name: find-replace

scripts.dist: rollup index.mjs -f umd -n findReplace -o dist/index.js && rollup index.mjs -f esm -o dist/index.mjs
scripts.docs: jsdoc2md -c jsdoc.conf -t README.hbs index.mjs > README.md; echo
